DOC.detailed_description: The aim multi centre double-blinded study investigate specificity sensitivities early detection prostate cancer new protein biomarker , annexin A3 , use urine digital rectal examination/massage ( exprimate urine ) direct comparison correspond measurement gold standard , total PSA . The material obtain non-invasive procedure moreover use determine appropriate cut-off value optimal fraction ( e.g . centrifugation ) calibration quantitative measurement novel marker . Patients ( 500-750 ) ( ) continuously recruit four clinical centre Germany ( Berlin , Tübingen , Ludwigshafen ) Austria ( Innsbruck ) . The major aspect : • Can annexin A3 provide good specificity tPSA , particular grey zone PSA ( 2-10 ng/ml ) annexin A3 thus contribute significant reduction invasive transrectal biopsy ?
